name: Spam Free
author: Jordy Kroeze

sections.description:
Get your WordPress Blog Spam-Free with this plugin.
Normal users doesnt even know your using it.
But it keeps away the spammers.

There are no longer updates for now.
Because I'm really busy with school.

Maybe in the future.

Sorry.

Other Notes.

You can email me at: info@jordykroeze.com
Or you could try gamerlv@mc-creative.nl but no guarantees!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder spam-free to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done.
sections.faq:
Questions?

  • How to turn it on.

You can turn it on in your admin section like all the plugins.
Simply ‘Activate’ and its working.

  • Your answer not here?

Contact me: info@jordykroeze.com
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Minor update to make it function under new wordpress

1.0

  • First version Launched.
  • So no changes.
